author: marvin
msg: Most of the memory mapping code in FSFileHandle.c was already using sys/mman.h
under Cygwin, but there was one preprocessor directive that had to be tweaked.

author: marvin
msg: Use symbol and header detection rather than probing to determine the determine
the directory separator character.  (The probing would often produce poor
results because of hack fixes that allow "/" to work under Windows or "\\"

author: hwright
msg: Update to reflect recent structural changes in the release docs.
